pkgmetadata.longdescription: From the Openswan web site: Openswan is an Open Source implementation of IPsec for the Linux operating system. Is it a code fork of the FreeS/WAN project, started by a few of the developers who were growing frustrated with the politics surrounding the FreeS/WAN project.

use.flag: Include additional algorithms such as Blowfish, Twofish and Serpent
Include weak algorithms such as DH1 and 1DES
